All Classes

Class Description
Admin
Represents an admin
AuthorizationException
If a user doesn't have authority
CannotTradeException
If the trade cannot happen
Database<T extends DatabaseItem>
This class is used to store a list of items with methods provided to update entries of that list.
DatabaseFilePaths
For paths to database files
DatabaseItem
Provides for a way to keep track of all items with each having a unique id
EntryNotFoundException
The entry was not found in the database
HandleFrozenManager
Handles anything relating to freezing a user
HandleItemRequestsManager
For handling new TradableItem requests
HandleTradeLimitsManager
This deals with everything relating to trade limits
LoginManager
Used for logging in and registering
Main
This is where the program starts running
Manager
This is used to help make accessing and modifying the database files to be easier, while giving the generic EntryNotFoundException more meaning.
TradableItem
Represents an item that is supposed to be traded
TradableItemNotFoundException
When the tradable item entry is not found
Trade
Represents a trade between two users
TradeNotFoundException
The trade entry doesn't exist
Trader
represents a trader(user who can trade)
TraderManager
Used for the actions of a Trader
TraderProperties  
TradingInfoManager
Handles anything about getting info on trading and on traders, but this does not handle trading itself
TradingManager
Used for trading
User
Represents a typical account
UserAlreadyExistsException
The user entry already exists
UserNotFoundException
The user entry doesn't exist
UserTypes
Represents different user account types
